title: How do I get Google or Verizon to give me the paperwork so I can get a new phone it's the battery is
content: My Pixel XL 3 is the battery is swelling the back of the phone I've called and talked to the to the help people and they had me on the phone for probably an hour and a half passed me around three times I feel like a bouncing ball
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
